```{r}
library(R2jags)
```

```{r}
# Define parameter values
n.occasions <- 6                   # Number of capture occasions
marked <- rep(50, n.occasions-1)   # Annual number of newly marked individuals
phi <- 0.65
p <- 0.4

# Define function to simulate a capture-history (CH) matrix
simul.cjs <- function(phi, p, marked){
  CH <- matrix(0, ncol = n.occasions, nrow = sum(marked))
  # Define a vector with the occasion of marking
  mark.occ <- rep(1:length(marked), marked[1:length(marked)])
  # Fill the CH matrix
  for (i in 1:sum(marked)){
    CH[i, mark.occ[i]] <- 1       # Write an 1 at the release occasion
    if (mark.occ[i]==n.occasions) next
    for (t in (mark.occ[i]+1):n.occasions){
      # Bernoulli trial: does individual survive occasion?
      sur <- rbinom(1, 1, phi)
      if (sur==0) break		# If dead, move to next individual 
      # Bernoulli trial: is individual recaptured? 
      rp <- rbinom(1, 1, p)
      if (rp==1) CH[i,t] <- 1
    } #t
  } #i
  return(CH)
}

```

```{r}

z.inits <- function(ch){
  state <- ch
  state[state==0] <- 1
  #get.first <- function(x) min(which(x!=0))
  f <- apply(ch, 1, get.first)
  for (i in 1:nrow(ch)){
    state[i,1:f[i]] <- NA
  }
  return(state)
}

# model
CJS_0 <- function()
{
  # Likelihood
  for (i in 1:nind){
    z[i,f[i]] <- 1
    for (t in (f[i]+1):n.occasions){
      z[i,t] ~ dbern(phi * z[i,t-1])
      y[i,t] ~ dbern(p * z[i,t])
      }
    }
  # Priors
  phi ~ dunif(0,1)
  p ~ dunif(0,1)
}


# Initial values

inits <- list(list(phi = 0.5, p = 0.5,z = z.inits(CH)),
              list(phi = 0.2, p = 0.9,z = z.inits(CH)),
              list(phi = 0.7, p = 0.7,z = z.inits(CH)))

# Parameters monitored
  
parameters <- c("phi", "p")

```

```{r}
# Call JAGS from R (BRT 1 min)
cjs.c.c <- jags(data = jags.data, 
                inits = inits, 
                parameters.to.save = parameters, 
                model.file = CJS_0, 
                n.chains = 3, 
                n.iter = 4000, 
                n.burnin = 1500)

# Summarize posteriors
print(cjs.c.c, digits = 3)
traceplot(cjs.c.c, ask =FALSE)
autocorr.plot(cjs.c.c)
```
